item.title: AWS S3 Cannot Delete Objects (even with Full S3 Permissions)
item.description: I pulled my hair for 3 hours before solving this. Now here’s the solution so that you don’t have to pull yours. Here’s the scenario: There is a S3 bucket There is an IAM user whose purpose is to access the bucket (create/update/delete objects) The IAM user has full S3 permissions on the bucket The IAM user can create/update objects but cannot delete objects (WTF?
